get.summary: Returns a paged list of all projects owned by the calling user.
Returns a paged list of the project that the user participates in.

patch.summary: Updates the project with the given ID.

delete.summary: Deletes the project with the given ID.

post.summary: Copies the project with the given ID as a new project.

get.summary: Returns the status of the project copy operation

post.summary: Creates a link that can be used to invite a user to a project.

get.summary: Returns a list of all users participating in the given project.

post.summary: Adds a participant to a project.

delete.summary: Removes a participant from a project

get.summary: Returns a paged list of the tiles of the given project.

requestBody.description: The data of the tile to be created

get.summary:
Returns a user authorization token that can be used to make authenticated requests to the API.
This method uses the ApiKey provided in the Authorization header in the form Bearer {api-key}
Returns the current licensing information for the calling user.
Removes a user from the given subscription.

post.summary: Adds a user to the given subscription.
Invites a user to the given subscription. This method will send an invitation email to the user, which the user can either accept or reject.

delete.summary: Removes a user from the given subscription.

post.summary:
Uploads a file on the server and creates the corresponding file tile.
This method will also trigger the image thumbnail generation, if applicable for the file type
